additionalParams.user_data_content:
<?xml version="1.0" ?>
<config xmlns="http://tail-f.com/ns/config/1.0">
  <contexts xmlns="urn:rdns:com:ericsson:oammodel:ericsson-contexts-ipos">
    <service>
      <multiple-contexts>true</multiple-contexts>
    </service>
  </contexts>
  <asp xmlns="urn:rdns:com:ericsson:oammodel:ericsson-asp-ipr">
    <default_asp_attr>
      <default_asp_attr>management/1</default_asp_attr>
      <shutdown>false</shutdown>
    </default_asp_attr>
  </asp>
  <contexts xmlns="urn:rdns:com:ericsson:oammodel:ericsson-contexts-ipos">
    <context xmlns="urn:rdns:com:ericsson:oammodel:ericsson-context-ipos">
      <context-name>local</context-name>
      <logging xmlns="urn:rdns:com:ericsson:oammodel:ericsson-logger-ipos">
        <console>false</console>
      </logging>
      <ip>
        <domain-name xmlns="urn:rdns:com:ericsson:oammodel:ericsson-dns-ipos">
          <name>URL for DNS here</name>
        </domain-name>
        <static-route xmlns="urn:rdns:com:ericsson:oammodel:ericsson-static-route-ipos">
          <ip-prefix>0.0.0.0/24</ip-prefix>
          <next-hop-type>next-hop-address</next-hop-type>
          <next-hop>10.150.126.65</next-hop>
          <description>SERVICE NET</description>
        </static-route>
      </ip>
      <service xmlns="urn:rdns:com:ericsson:oammodel:ericsson-service-ipos">
        <sftp>
          <server/>
        </sftp>
        <ftp-client/>
        <ssh>
          <server/>
          <client/>
        </ssh>
        <telnet>
          <server/>
          <client/>
        </telnet>
        <scp>
          <server/>
          <client/>
        </scp>
      </service>
    </context>
  </contexts>
  <interfaces xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:yang:ietf-interfaces">
    <interface>
      <name>mgmt@local</name>
      <type xmlns:ianaift="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:yang:iana-if-type">ianaift:ipForward</type>
      <l3-interface xmlns="urn:rdns:com:ericsson:oammodel:ericsson-interfaces-ext-ipos">
        <context>local</context>
        <ip>
          <address>
            <addr-primary>
              <addr>10.150.126.90/27</addr>
            </addr-primary>
          </address>
          <source-address>
            <options>
              <snmp/>
              <ssh/>
              <ftp/>
            </options>
          </source-address>
        </ip>
      </l3-interface>
    </interface>
    <interface>
      <name>management</name>
      <type xmlns:ianaift="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:yang:iana-if-type">ianaift:ethernetCsmacd</type>
      <enabled>true</enabled>
      <ethernet xmlns="urn:rdns:com:ericsson:oammodel:ericsson-ethernet-ext-ipos">
        <bind-interface>
          <intf-name>mgmt@local</intf-name>
          <intf-ctx>local</intf-ctx>
        </bind-interface>
      </ethernet>
    </interface>
  </interfaces>
  <system xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:yang:ietf-system">
    <timeout xmlns="urn:rdns:com:ericsson:oammodel:ericsson-aaa-ipos">
      <session>
        <idle>43200</idle>
      </session>
    </timeout>
    <authentication>
      <user>
        <name>ericsson</name>
        <password>$1$wQimBL27$UZSvaEqpy6RPBo1wyN44Wnu5l80sbU75c5OTZOfgVgsb19qs3Sdeskw/NJhixUwcanp4BoZTf14c4QakdAUla0</password>
      </user>
    </authentication>
    <hostname>vepg-01</hostname>
  </system>
  <nacm xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:yang:ietf-netconf-acm">
    <groups>
      <group>
        <name>ericsson-support</name>
        <user-name>ericsson</user-name>
      </group>
      <group>
        <name>system-admin</name>
        <user-name>ericsson</user-name>
      </group>
      <group>
        <name>system-security-admin</name>
        <user-name>ericsson</user-name>
      </group>
      <group>
        <name>epg-charging-admin</name>
        <user-name>ericsson</user-name>
      </group>
      <group>
        <name>epg-lawful-intercept-admin</name>
        <user-name>ericsson</user-name>
      </group>
    </groups>
  </nacm>
  <asp xmlns="urn:rdns:com:ericsson:oammodel:ericsson-asp-ipr">
    <default_asp_attr>
      <default_asp_attr>management/1</default_asp_attr>
      <shutdown>false</shutdown>
    </default_asp_attr>
    <pool>
      <pool-name>epgpool</pool-name>
      <service>epg</service>
      <asp>management/1</asp>
    </pool>
  </asp>
</config>
